creator: andreas@apache.org
text:
localhost:8888/foo/bar (with Jetty) causes an exception:

pubs/foo/config/publication.xconf not found

Why does it look for publication.xconf and not publication.xml?

creator: andreas@apache.org
text:
Created attachment 20042
Adds error handling for non-existing publications.

creator: nettings@apache.org
text:
patch works for me. i have added a back link.
i'm +1 for inclusion into RC2, should be low-risk.

Created attachment 20043
adds a back link to andreas' error handler.
creator: nettings@apache.org

text: I applied the patch. Thanks for testing + enhancing!
creator: andreas@apache.org
